ANY.NAME: Any
ANY.P1: Excellent gym. The facilities are spotless
ANY.P2: Machines in optimal condition, everything works
ANY.P3: Not like other gyms that put up an “under repair” sign

ADRIANA.NAME: Adriana
ADRIANA.P1: The best gym. Organized, clean, good music, working machines, 2 large studios, comfortable bathrooms and showers
ADRIANA.P2: Coaches, front desk and people are always friendly
ADRIANA.P3: They offer discounts at nearby stores for members

ALEJANDRO.NAME: Alejandro
ALEJANDRO.P1: First of all, staff attention 100/100 — super kind!
ALEJANDRO.P2: Impeccable facilities, well-maintained and varied equipment

reviews.q1: The best gym. Tidy, clean, good music, machines that work, 2 large studios, comfortable bathrooms and showers. The coaches, the reception girls, and the people are always friendly/have good vibes. They offer discounts at nearby shops for being a member.
reviews.q2: Excellent gym. The cleanliness of the facilities. Machines in optimal condition, all working, unlike other gyms that put up 'under repair' signs. The coaches are always there to support you. You tell them what you want to achieve, and they design the routines for you, guiding you every step of the way during your process. Good vibes and a very good atmosphere!! I highly recommend it.
reviews.q3: The best gym. As soon as I saw the place, I was enchanted by the tidiness, the cleanliness, the spaces, the lighting, but what truly stands out is the staff, from the receptionists who are lovely, to the excellent trainers, always ready to explain the routine and correct your technique. Finding this place has been the best experience I've had. I've been here for 1 month, and luckily, I made the excellent decision to pay for the annual plan. Omnia has become my favorite part of the day.

TRAINERS.TITLE: Trainers
TRAINERS.TEXT: We have a team of 8 certified trainers

MACHINES.TITLE: Machines
MACHINES.TEXT: More than 20 state-of-the-art machines for complete workouts

LOCATION.TITLE: Where are we?
LOCATION.DESCRIPTION:
We are located at Fitz Roy 2261, right in Palermo.
In front of us is the Distrito Arcos Premium Outlet.
Just 2 blocks from Palermo Station (San Martín train) and close to Subway Line D.

WELCOME.P1_PART3: THAT'S WHY WE HAVE PREPARED SOME TIPS SO YOU KNOW HOW TO START:

COMFORT.TITLE: Feel comfortable
COMFORT.TEXT: Choose the sportswear you feel most comfortable in and start training! Cardio, group classes, weight machines, etc. We have the best options to make your workout even more fun and versatile.

LOCKERS.TITLE: Lockers
LOCKERS.TEXT: You have DAILY USE lockers to store your bags and belongings. Always bring a padlock for your security. You can also ask about MONTHLY RENTALS.

FIRST_TIME.TITLE: First time
FIRST_TIME.SUBTITLE: There’s always a first time
FIRST_TIME.TEXT: If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to ask the coaches about your training plan, how to use equipment safely, or what exercises to do to achieve your goals.

MEDICAL.TITLE: Medical clearance
MEDICAL.TEXT: It’s mandatory, and you have one month to get it done. You can do it through our DOC, who comes to the gym to perform basic check-ups.

NUTRITION.TITLE: Nutrition
NUTRITION.SUBTITLE: Eat Well
NUTRITION.TEXT: Eat real food → prioritize fresh and natural foods
NUTRITION.TEXT2: Stay hydrated always → water is your best ally for performance
NUTRITION.TEXT3: Balance, not restrictions → learn to combine, not to prohibit

ENERGY.TITLE: Energy
ENERGY.TEXT: The most important thing is the desire, enthusiasm, and determination to exercise. Remember: perseverance achieves everything.

opening_hours.title: Opening hours:
opening_hours.weekday: MONDAY TO FRIDAY 7 AM to 10 PM
